title: AirAsia offer: Win OnePlus 2 smartphones, invites on flight bookings
text:
Budget airline AirAsia and technology startup OnePlus today announced a first-of-its-kind partnership to provide AirAsia India flyers with a chance to win invites to win OnePlus 2 smartphones. The AirAsia offer is valid on ticket bookings made between September 30, 2015 and October 09, 2015 on the airline’s website, for the travel period between October 10, 2015 and October 20, 2015.
Mittu Chandilya, AirAsia India CEO & Managing Director said, “Coming together with a brand as popular as OnePlus is very exciting for us at AirAsia. This association is sure to excite our flyers. The added anticipation of receiving a OnePlus 2 invite during this travel period is going to make it even more memorable!”
OnePlus will offer up to 1,000 OnePlus 2 invites to AirAsia passengers (predetermined through a lucky draw) who travel to any of the 10 destinations where AirAsia operates. The lucky winners will receive the physical invites while they are seated inside the plane from AirAsia crew.
An extra that OnePlus is offering travellers is a chance to win OnePlus 2 smartphones, but this is applicable on select flights.
Vikas Agarwal, General Manager – India, OnePlus said, “This is a unique collaboration between an airline and a smartphone brand. OnePlus never ceases to surprise its fans and this campaign has been designed to do that! This is our way of making their dreams come true of owning a OnePlus 2 by simply flying AirAsia.”
 28, 2015 3:07 pm
